title: Recent Match History Failing to load.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
EDIT: [Actual Match History](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/118914077/201161427)

Is anyone else having problems viewing the match history on the Riot Website? I have tried on multiple accounts to access match history but nothing seems to load, just the basic border interface. Its not my net taking ages to load either.

It seems that only the basic HTML/CSS info is being sent from the server. Perhaps a script is broken?

Its been like this for a week now.

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Thanks for the reports on this.  We're also seeing some issues on our end with match history, and we're looking into the root cause.

I'll let you know more when I do.

Cheers
Mindstar

We've found a potential fix - try and load it and let me know if you are still having problems.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi,

I am still having this exact problem. I am using a Mac and Safari as my browser.

Hey there,

I am currently able to load that page perfectly fine, it's possible you're having issues loading certain resources required.

Are any error messages printed to your browser's developer console when viewing the page, if you're using chrome you can open the console with the following keyboard shortcuts.
> Command + Option + J (Mac) or Control + Shift + J (Windows/Linux).

What errors (if any) are printed?

Can you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) and see if that resolves your issue.

Hope this helps.

I'm in the same boat - Both safari and Firefox on Mac are showing a truncated twig.js file.

I'm using 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4 as my DNS. 

I have tried downloading the file with wget, to skip any browser issues, and the file is still truncated.

The file is: 
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/assets/1.0.10/lib/twig.js

HOWEVER

If I append ?time=12345 to the end of the wget, the file comes through perfectly. 
You may have a reverse proxy handling for the outside public - which may have cached the broken file. Just add a cache breaker to the end of the file reference and that should fix the problem for everyone.

PS: I'm a manager of web developers so can assist further if required.
Same thing here. I'm in Arizona. The server I'm connecting to is 190.93.247.186 using the URL: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/assets/1.0.10/lib/twig.js

Hi,

I'm having the same problem. The shortcut is Command + Option + I for Mac.

I'm getting this error. Looks like twig.js is cut off?
twig.js: [Error] SyntaxError: Unexpected end of script
	(anonymous function)
ramen.js: [Error] ReferenceError: Can't find variable: Twig
	undefined::initTemplate
	undefined::constructor

That's odd, seems twig.js is loading but failing somewhere.

Could you clear your cache and see if the problem continues to occur, perhaps try clearing your cache and then loading the file [directly](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/assets/1.0.10/lib/twig.js) so your browser caches it correctly.

It's possible your browser's JS engine might not be playing nice, what browser are you using? Have you tried any other browser?

I'm using Chrome on OSX 10.10, and I'm currently having the same issue - I can confirm that twig.js is truncated at line 3625 (approx. 31.6kb) with an error identical to the one reported by Little Player. Cleared cache, tried again, same result.

I've also tried pulling it down with curl, just to eliminate any chance of browser cache being the issue, and still get the file truncated in the same spot.

I was using Safari. Same thing with Firefox. I've cleared the cache and ended up with the same thing.

When I load the file directly, the last line looks like it's cut off.
